video_prompt: Young woman actively walking through tall grass, hair and clothing flowing in the wind. Her stride suggests constant forward motion over changing terrain. Her arm gestures subtly as she holds a tool. Clouds drift across a vibrant sky. The dynamic perspective shifts with her movement.
image_prompt: Hyperrealistic anime style, young woman walking in a field of dry, tall grass. Dynamic low-angle shot looking up. Fair skin, long dark flowing hair, expressive face (rosy cheeks/lips). White tank top, reddish-orange jacket draped, light blue jacket with bunched sleeves, yellow choker. Complex black/yellow belt with pouches, black shorts, one leg with black thigh-high sock, other bare. White athletic socks, beige/blue sneakers. Right arm bent, left arm extended holding a tool/weapon. Wind-blown hair. Vibrant sky with wispy yellow/orange/white clouds. Golden-brown textured grass. Bright, lively color palette; detailed character, graphic background.
refined_video_prompt: A woman strides purposefully through tall grass, causing it to ripple and sway. Her hair and clothing flow dynamically with the wind. The terrain continuously alters under her sustained forward motion. An arm subtly gestures, the tool she carries swinging with her steps. Clouds drift steadily across the sky. The dynamic perspective shifts constantly, tracking her movement.
